name: Powerlines (K3rnalS, Chris Dichmann)
description:
Submission for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam

PowerLines is a puzzle-solving dungeon-crawler where color is key! Work your way through floor after floor of challenges, using boxes linked by powerlines to direct the flow of energy where you need it to go. The catch: YOU are a powerline yourself! Your mechanical body is only another piece of the puzzle.

WASD - Move around

Left Click -  Pickup cubes

Tab - Pause Menu

F - Recall back to your crate

Matthew Popowycz - 3D Artist

Zarin Vandyk - Programmer

Sam Ponpadung - Level Designer

Chris Dichmann - Puzzle Designer

Sean Cornish -  2D Artist

Bailey Butler - Audio Designer
